local_intent: Detect white_plate, move above, compute grasp, approach & align, pick, and verify grasp stability
assumptions: gripper has been opened by an earlier step
white_plate is visible and reachable by sensors
coherence_with_global: Implements the ApproachAndAlign micro-goal and surrounding steps from GLOBAL_BT (DetectObject, MoveAbove, ComputeGraspPose, ApproachAndAlign, Pick, IsGraspStable) using the same blackboard key and binned timeouts/tolerances.
